name: Mr. Mime
specialText: Reduces the damage received by the Pokemon for a short time after it uses a move.
basicAttack: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and throwing (knockback) opposing Pokemon when it hits.

skills.name: Fake Out
skills.effect: Makes the user slap its hands together, shoving (knockback) opposing Pokemon in front of it.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.effect: Attacks straight in front of the user, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon and shoving (knockback) them.

skills.name: Psychic
skills.effect: Centers a telekinetic blast on both the user and any guard-swapped opposing Pokemon, damaging all opposing Pokemon caught in the blasts and lowering their Sp. Def for a short time. If an opposing Pokemon is hit by multiple overlapping blasts, that Pokemon is also left unable to act (stun) for a short time.
skills.upgrades: Continually deals damage while this move is in effect and decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokemon.

skills.name: Light Screen
skills.effect: Creates a wall of light in the designated area that prevents opposing Pokemon from passing.

skills.name: Barrier
skills.effect: Creates a translucent wall that prevents opposing Pokemon from passing. This move's cooldown begins after two walls have been placed.
skills.upgrades: Increases this move's uses by one.

skills.name: Guard Swap
skills.effect: Temporarily swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of another Pokemon when it hits. Swapping with an opposing Pokemon deals damage overtime to them and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally Pokemon increases their movement speed for a short time.
skills.upgrades: Continually restores the HP of the user and the ally Pokemon while this move is in effect.

skills.name: Showtime!
skills.effect: Mr. Mime's Unite Move. Has the user jump to the designated location and start a pantomime performance, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act (stun) for a short time.
